title: Immunity Debugger - Memory Breakpoint
content: Is there a way to stop execution each time some memory address is accessed?

answers_data.content:
Yes For a memory access breakpoint1, just 
right click
the desired address > 
Breakpoint
> 
Memory, on access
: The same applies to values in the hex dump: 1: A breakpoint on access will break whenver the address is read, written or executed. An execution breakpoint will never break on read/write.
